subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: L.P.G.A.  and tournament officials said the Jamie Farr Owens Corning Classic would take a year off in 2011 before returning for at least three more years.
snippet: L.P.G.A.  and tournament officials said the Jamie Farr Owens Corning Classic would take a year off in 2011 before returning for at least three more years.
